TopicTitle: More scientific support for space experimentation

Articles.Content:
Just read in Gizmodo that Chris Hadfield's health study has uncovered various space-related ailments that basically turn you in an 80 year old with type 2 diabetes... And that study of this can help us work on cures/preventatives for sufferers here on earth

read it here: http://www.gizmodo.co.uk/2014/06/living-in-space-is-like-being-old-and-having-type-2-diabetes/

What do you guys hope we might cure with future similar studies/experimentation?
